item.title: How to setup NGINX
item.description: Step 1. Install nginx To install nginx/Windows, download the latest mainline version distribution (1.19.6), since the mainline branch of nginx contains all known fixes. Then unpack the distribution, go to the nginx-1.19.6 directory, and run nginx. Here is an example for the drive C: root directory: cd c:\ unzip nginx-1.19.6.zip cd nginx-1.19.6 start nginx Step 2. Run Run the tasklist command-line utility to see nginx processes: C:\nginx-1.19.6>tasklist /fi "imagename eq nginx.

item.title: Install Docker Desktop on Windows
item.description: Download Download the Docker Desktop Installer from Docker Hub. Click on Get Docker Desktop for Windows Install Double-click Docker for Windows Installer to run the installer. When the installation finishes, Docker starts automatically. The whale [image_tag] in the notification area indicates that Docker is running, and accessible from a terminal. Run Open a command-line terminal like PowerShell, and try out some Docker commands!
